Package uno

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CardsTest
    JUnit tests for the Card Deck logic and creation.
    FXMLDocumentController
    This class is the controller for all components of the GUI, containing each component's action listener and related game logic to link the GUI to the UnoGame class.
    FXMLDocumentControllerAI
    This class is the controller for all components of the GUI, containing each component's action listener and related game logic to link the GUI to the UnoGame class.
    GameTest
    JUnit tests for the game logic.
    Player
    This class models player objects that resemble the four players in the uno game, and their hands of cards.
    PlayerTest
    JUnit tests for the Card Deck logic and creation.
    UnoCards
    This class models uno card objects used to represent the individual uno cards in the deck and player hands.
    UnoGame
    This class handles all game logic for the UNO game.
    UnoGUI
    This class contains the main method to start the program and allow the user to choose which game type to play.
